mapper.select: select * from REPLY where BNUM=#{bnum} order by rseq
select R_LIKE from reply where rseq=#{rseq}
mapper.update: update REPLY set R_LIKE=(select R_LIKE+1 from REPLY where RSEQ=#{rseq}) where RSEQ=#{rseq}
update REPLY set R_LIKE=(select R_LIKE-1 from REPLY where RSEQ=#{rseq}) where RSEQ=#{rseq}
mapper.select: select FLAG from R_LIKE_TAB where MNUM=#{mnum} and RSEQ=#{rseq}
mapper.delete: delete from R_LIKE_TAB where mnum=#{mnum} and rseq=#{rseq}
